data.expected_result: It should allow me to type capital O and not instantly closing the overlay
data.short_description: If you set the overlay keybind to shift + a letter. The quick switcher instantly closes when using this keybind
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to user settings -> Overlay - Set a keybind to something like "Shift + O" - Try to open quick switcher and press "Shift + O" to get a capital O - Observe how the quick switcher instantly closes
